hulk.name: Robert Bruce Banner
hulk.Graduation College: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (Doctor of Physics, Doctor of Engineering)
hulk.Major Capabilities: Invincible strength and endurance. Fly like jump. A body that cannot be penetrated by a knife or gun. Strong self-healing ability.

iron man.Name: Tony Stark
iron man.Career: Chairman of Stark Industries, Super Hero
iron man.Graduation College: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (Doctor of Physics, Doctor of Engineering)
iron man.Major Capabilities: Steel Warfare Garments, Manufacturing Various High-Tech Equipment

scarlet witch.Name: Wanda Django Maximoff
scarlet witch.Main achievements: Join the avengers, kill Ultron, and wreak havoc on thanos

thor.Name: Thor Odinson
thor.Career: The Norse god of thunder, prince Asgard, superhero
thor.Main achievements: Helped found the avengers and ended ragnarok
thor.Major Capabilities: Far beyond all the physical and sensory abilities of human beings. Weapons and knives all over the body, thunder and lightning and storm control
